search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for NationBuilder (nationbuilder.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for NationBuilder can be found at: https://nationbuilder.com/pricing【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalize content, provide social media features, and analyze website traffic. We also disclose information regarding your website usage to our marketing and analytics partners, and this disclosure may be considered a “sale” or the “sharing/processing” of personal data for online targeted advertising, as defined by applicable laws. By selecting “Accept All Cookies,” you consent to our use of cookies. To modify your cookie consent preferences in the future or to get more information about the specific types of cookies we use, please visit our [Cookie Declaration](https://nationbuilder.com/cookie_declaration) page. For more details about how we handle and protect your personal data, please refer to our [Privacy Policy](https://nationbuilder.com/privacy).

Your consent applies to the following domains: try.nationbuilder.com, enterprise.nationbuilder.com, nationbuilder.com, lp.nationbuilder.com/, setup.nationbuilder.com

Allow Selected Cookies

Strictly Necessary Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. \[[cookie details](https://nationbuilder.com/cookie_declaration)\]

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly. \[[cookie details](https://nationbuilder.com/cookie_declaration)\]

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance. \[[cookie details](https://nationbuilder.com/cookie_declaration)\]

Marketing Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising. \[[cookie details](https://nationbuilder.com/cookie_declaration)\]

Unclassified Cookies

Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies. \[[cookie details](https://nationbuilder.com/cookie_declaration)\]

This website uses cookies

By clicking “Accept All Cookies” you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. For more details about how we handle and protect your personal data, please refer to our [Privacy Policy](https://nationbuilder.com/privacy).

Cookie declaration last updated on 4/11/25 by [Cookiebot](https://www.cookiebot.com/ "Cookiebot")

pricing_data.pricing_notes: No pricing information was available in the provided content.

Pricing
=======

Flexible plans to fit every mission
-----------------------------------

Whether you're just getting started or scaling your organization, we have customizable plans that are right for you.

Billing Cycle

  Monthly Billing Annual Billing

### Starter

$34/mo

Get your idea off the ground with this **essential starter kit**

Capacity

![Image 8](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686013225/icon-users.svg?1686013225) 

[Start a free trial](https://nationbuilder.com/create?package=starter&billing=annual)

What's included:

*   Integrated people database **starting at 500 contacts and up to 5K contacts**
*   Website with standard templates built for action
*   Email blast functionality
*   [Payment and donation processing](https://nationbuilder.com/payments)
*   Events and ticketing
*    ![Image 9: ActionButton](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1672875111/actionbutton.svg?1672875111) ActionButton Basic included for easy-to-share quizzes, polls, petitions, and more
*   ![Image 10: ActionButton](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1672875111/actionbutton.svg?1672875111) Check voter registration _(US Only)_
*   **Add on [additional websites, text messaging, and ActionButton+](https://nationbuilder.com/pricing#starter-add-ons)**

### Starter Add-ons

#### 1 additional website

\+ **$9**/mo

#### Phone number, text messages & registration

Use a virtual phone number to send text message blasts to a group of supporters. Text keywords allow people to take action from their phone without filling out forms. Text messaging is only available in the continental U.S. & Canada.

[View text message pricing](https://nationbuilder.com/pricing#)

#### ActionButton

Basic

**Included**

Plus

\+ **$49**/mo

[View features](https://nationbuilder.com/pricing#feature-actionbutton)

View add-ons available on Starter

### Pro

$160/mo

Equip your team with world-class features you can **add on as you need**

Capacity

![Image 11](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686013225/icon-users.svg?1686013225) 

[Start a free trial](https://nationbuilder.com/create?package=pro&billing=annual)

Everything in Starter, plus:

*   Integrated people database **starting at 500 contacts and up to 15K contacts**
*   Custom fields and permissions
*   Membership management
*   Drip email automations and a/b testing
*   Address geocoding and turf cutting
*   Walk and call sheets
*   Autodistricting
*   Precinct point people
*   Contact lawmakers and decision-makers with  ![Image 12](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1672875111/actionbutton.svg?1672875111) ActionButton Plus
*   **Access to [more add-ons](https://nationbuilder.com/pricing#pro-add-ons) to supercharge your nation**

### Pro Add-ons

Everything in **Starter**, plus:

#### Customization pack

*   5 additional custom fields
*   2 additional permission sets

\+ **$29**/mo

#### Membership pack

*   4 additional membership types

\+ **$39**/mo

#### Automation pack

*   4 additional drip automations

\+ **$39**/mo

#### Election pack

*   3 additional permission sets
*   2 additional running automations
*   2 additional membership types
*   10 additional custom fields
*   1650 additional text messages per month

\+ **$89**/mo

View add-ons available on Pro

### Enterprise

Custom

Our most powerful plan, **all inclusive**, and built for scale

Chat to sales [Learn more](https://nationbuilder.com/enterprise)

Everything in Pro, plus:

*   **Custom database capacity and unlimited email sends**
*   Dedicated Enterprise Account Manager, custom onboarding, and professional services
*   Enhanced automations
*   Maximum custom fields, permission sets and memberships
*   Access to developer API and single sign-on
*   Unlimited access to all  ![Image 13](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1672875111/actionbutton.svg?1672875111) ActionButton Plus actions
*   **All Starter and Pro add-ons included, plus [access to even more](https://nationbuilder.com/pricing#enterprise-add-ons)**

### Enterprise Add-ons

Everything in **Starter** and **Pro** are included in your plan, plus:

#### NationBuilder Insights

Make informed decisions to take your organizing to the next level, and get to know your supporters with machine learning and data insights.

**Custom price**

#### NationBuilder Network

Make everyone's life easier with unified infrastructure for your headquarters and local chapters.

**Custom price**

[Learn more](https://nationbuilder.com/network)

#### Enhanced email & texting

Dedicated email IP and SMS short code options.

**Custom price**

View add-ons available on Enterprise

If contacts exceed maximum allowable capacity for a given plan, additional costs will apply.

Support
-------

### FAQs

Everything you need to know about the product and billing. Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our team.

*   How does the free trial work?
    
    If you [start a 14-day free trial](https://nationbuilder.com/create) of our Starter or Pro plan, you'll have complete access to the NationBuilder platform (with the exception of sending email blasts). We'll send resources to help get you started, and then at the end of the trial period, your account will roll into an annual or monthly subscription on the plan and setting you've selected. At any time during your trial period, you can visit the “Settings” tab in your Control Panel to change your plan type and select any add-ons you choose to include once your trial ends. If you're interested in learning more about our Enterprise plans, [fill out the contact form](https://nationbuilder.com/enterprise_contact) and our team will be in touch.
    
*   What are my billing options and when will I be charged?
    
    For your convenience, you can choose between monthly and annual billing. Monthly billing is based on the number of people in your database at the time of billing each month, as well as any add-ons or bundles you include in your plan for that month. You get a discount for prepaying on annual billing, and any increases in the number of people in your database or add-on features are discounted as well. Customers on our Starter and Pro plans can expect to pay 20% more on monthly billing than they would on annual billing.
    
    Your credit card won't be charged until the conclusion of your 14-day free trial. At that time, you'll be charged the monthly price of the plan you select when you start your trial. If you choose to change your selected plan, you can do so at any time in the Settings tab of your NationBuilder control panel. If you'd like to send an email blast or purchase any add on features, you can do after your trial ends, or choose to convert out of trial early by taking one of those actions.
    
*   What is an add-on, and how can I incorporate one into my plan?
    
    Add-ons are packs and bundles of additional features you can purchase to customize your NationBuilder plan for your organization and your use case. Add ons are available for an additional monthly cost to help you supercharge your organizing work.
    
    Add ons can be purchased within the Account Settings of your Control Panel in the Add-Ons tab of the Contacts and billing section once you complete your 14-day free trial.
    
*   What if I want to cancel my plan or add-on?
    
    You can shut down your nation at any time and you will not be charged. You own your own data, so you can always do a full export of your database before you cancel.
    
    Add-ons are available on a monthly basis, so if you anticipate that you won't need your added-on features anymore, you can always remove them. If you'd like to resume, you can add them back to your plan again via \[your account settings within the Control Panel\]. Our goal, though, is to provide you with features that can help you grow, and that you'll want to keep using them to make your organizing efforts that much more effective.
    

[Read the full FAQ](https://support.nationbuilder.com/en/articles/4143996-pricing-faqs)

> “We have found the switch to Nationbuilder has increased engagement in our campaigns. New campaigns are easy to create and have seen some really positive engagement with our emails including increase open rates. Having an in built CRM allows you to easily see who has taken action and encourages people to recruit more supporters. We are looking forward to using it to build our online community and mobilise students on issues affecting them.”
> 
> ![Image 14: Corrine Heaney](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640872/customer-testimonial_nus_corrine-heaney.png?1686640872) **Corrine Heaney**  
> Digital Communications Director (UK), NUS

![Image 15](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640804/customer-testimonial_nus.jpg?1686640804)

> “We wanted to provide \[people\] with ways to add their voice to the issues that matter to them and that can make a difference in their lives. NationBuilder allowed us to do all this. We saw our supporters move through ladders of engagement and watched many become super activists. It's been powerful.”
> 
> ![Image 16: Laurie Antonin](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640872/customer-testimonial_canadian-labour-congress_laurie-antonin.png?1686640872) **Laurie Antonin**  
> Digital Outreach at Canadian Labour Congress

![Image 17](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640871/customer-testimonial_canadian-labour-congress.jpg?1686640871)

> “Using a tool like NationBuilder is an easy way to keep people engaged, because you've got everything at the click of a button right there at your fingertips. When we got down to the end of our campaign, closer we could use all of our resources through NationBuilder to actually turn people out.”
> 
> ![Image 18: Chris Barrineau](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640871/customer-testimonial_steven-reed-campaign_chris-barrineau.png?1686640871) **Chris Barrineau**  
> Campaign Finance Director for the Steven Reed campaign

![Image 19](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640872/customer-testimonial_steven-reed-campaign.jpg?1686640872)

> “We grew a large number of supporters, volunteers and donors in a short amount of time, so to communicate and organize through one system that could scale with us made it all possible. It meant that we weren't spending hours and hours trying to sort and update data.”
> 
> ![Image 20: Andy Knight](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640873/customer-testimonial_zali-steggall-campaign_andy-knight.png?1686640873) **Andy Knight**  
> Digital Strategist for the Zali Steggall campaign

![Image 21](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686790151/customer-testimonial_zali-steggall-campaign.jpg?1686790151)

> “Having the opportunity to use something like NationBuilder was game-changing—to be novices and to have the resources all in one place. In the very beginning I remember saying something like 'It's like they wrote it for me.' As if somebody was like, 'What would Linda need if she wanted to do this crazy thing?' And that's what NationBuilder was.”
> 
> ![Image 22: Linda Ciavarelli](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640872/customer-testimonial_meridian-pa_linda-ciavarelli.png?1686640872) **Linda Ciavarelli**  
> Co-Founder of Meridian PA

![Image 23](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640872/customer-testimonial_meridian-pa.jpg?1686640872)

> “We have found the switch to Nationbuilder has increased engagement in our campaigns. New campaigns are easy to create and have seen some really positive engagement with our emails including increase open rates. Having an in built CRM allows you to easily see who has taken action and encourages people to recruit more supporters. We are looking forward to using it to build our online community and mobilise students on issues affecting them.”
> 
> ![Image 24: Corrine Heaney](https://assets.nationbuilder.com/themes/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/attachments/original/1686640872/customer-testimonial_nus_corrine-heaney.png?1686640872) **Corrine Heaney**

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Essential starter kit for small organizations.
features: Integrated people database starting at 500 contacts and up to 5K contacts
Integrated people database starting at 500 contacts and up to 15K contacts
Drip email automations and A/B testing
Custom database capacity and unlimited email sends
Maximum custom fields, permission sets, and memberships
Access to developer API and single sign-on
Unlimited access to all ActionButton Plus actions
